meanings.definition: A person who engages in frivolous or unimportant activities.
meanings.sent1: She is known as a trifler because she spends her time on trivial matters.
meanings.sent2: The park was full of triflers enjoying the sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The trifler decided to organize a party for her cat, complete with tiny hats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of serious business, he was seen as a trifler playing with toys.
meanings.sent5: The image of the trifler juggling rubber ducks stuck in everyone's mind.

meanings.definition: To act or speak in a frivolous or unimportant manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't trifler during the important meeting.
meanings.sent2: He tends to trifler when he is nervous.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they triflered about in the playground.
meanings.sent4: Her mind would often trifler off during boring lectures.
meanings.sent5: The wind seemed to trifler through the leaves, whispering secrets to the trees.
